design file

Description:
[Automation][Regression]Exception occurs when preview a outputParams["xxx"]

Build number: 
2.3.0.v20071210-0800

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a stored procedure dataset
2, New a dataitem refer to the dataset parameter using outputParams["xxx"]
3, Preview

Expected result:
The value should be displayed well

Actual result:
Exception occurs

Error log:
Cannot execute the statement.
SQL statement does not return a ResultSet object.
SQL error #1: Parameter #1 has not been set.

Cannot execute the statement.SQL statement does not return a ResultSet object.SQL error #1: Parameter #1 has not been set. ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: Cannot execute the statement.SQL statement does not return a ResultSet object.SQL error #1: Parameter #1 has not been set. at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.addException(ExecutionContext.java:1023) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.addException(ExecutionContext.java:985) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.DteDataEngine.doExecuteQuery(DteDataEngine.java:148) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.AbstractDataEngine.execute(AbstractDataEngine.java:225) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.executeQuery(ExecutionContext.java:1693) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.QueryItemExecutor.executeQuery(QueryItemExecutor.java:77) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.DataItemExecutor.execute(DataItemExecutor.java:74) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.dup.SuppressDuplicateItemExecutor.execute(SuppressDuplicateItemExecutor

The error is caused by the change of super class PreparedDataSourceQuery, in its subclass PreparedOdaDSQuery, we should overwrite this execute method to prepare all necessary parameter for all ODA dataset. Fix it now

Verified on v20071211-0800 build, closed!
Regards~
